Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 68th overall pick, by New Jersey in 1976...
Injured on 7/12/1978 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 5/9/1979...

Had first career hit (double) on 4/23/1983, off Thomas Folger (SHP)...
